record.id: field.name="keywords" and file.name="help" and term="Related information" and format.name=NULL and syslanguage="en"
record.field.name: keywords
record.file.name: help

brief.brief: The terms that define related help records.
To open the related record, put your curser in the field and click press F8 (click Find).
To select from a list of records, press F9 (click Fill).

detail.detail: This array enables you to link to other help records containing information related to the current help record. These linked records may elaborate on the subject discussed in the current help record or introduce a new topic.
To create a link to a related record, specify the value in the term field of the help entries that contain related information.
Important: The value in the related information field must match the value in the term field in order to open the related record.
